name: movie_data_storage_crud
description: crud app to store movie data
author: Nicholas Tsang

scripts.package: mkdir -p dist/layers/deps-layer/nodejs && mkdir -p dist/layers/util-layer/nodejs && mkdir -p dist/handlers/put_movie_data && cp package*.json dist/layers/deps-layer/nodejs && cp yarn.lock dist/layers/deps-layer/nodejs && mv dist/layers/util-layer/utils.js* dist/layers/util-layer/nodejs && cd dist/layers/deps-layer/nodejs && yarn --modules-folder node_modules --frozen-lockfile --production=true
